page.title: 11DERELICT LAND
page.content: {DERELICT LAND}in the area comes from the sites of the old coal mines. There were three pits in Foxley and two in Mount Vernon.Housing Estates cover both sites.A pit site at the bottom of Mount Vernon Ave. still lies waste.A monument to the collieries is in the Cambuslang Industrial Estate. Sand pits were also a prominent feature of the area.The land behind Kenmuir Church has been infilled but is lying waste.Patersons are continually infilling at Daldowie and Kenmuir.The maternity hospital site at Broomhouse is vacant. There is a lot of waste land around Newton but especially Westburn with their closed steel work.The engineering works site at Fullerton has been occupied by new houses.Waste land as it matures is either being developed for industry, landscaping or housing .
